astro: astronomer 天文学家；astronomy 天文学；as
A section of Astro Turf in an otherwise desert landscape.
拉斯维加斯的沙漠风情.
Airline pilots also have reported seeing astro - nauts ── the men who fly in spaceships.
航空公司的飞行员也曾经报告说看到过,甚至连在宇宙中飞行的宇航员都曾经见到过.
But Astro keeps returning to civilization.
但是亚斯卓不断重返文明世界.
Even the Astro Boy generation is becoming disillusioned.
即使是伴随着《铁臂阿童木》一起长大的那一代人的梦想也破灭了.
